Test Description: Tests if model can identify patterns within the dominoes
Difficulty Notes: Model needs to differentiate between different combinations of biomes present within dominoes.
Question: How many unique combinations of biomes are present in the pictured dominoes? Assume the minor details don't matter, rather the high-level patterns/colors/domains. Each domino half contains one biome, therefore there are up to two unique biomes per domino.
Rationale: (in no order) there exist the following combinations: Green-green, blue-yellow, yellow-brown, forest-yellow, forest-blue, blue-green, brown-black, yellow-green, yellow-yellow.
